fileheader.author: IceGuye, Bo Lan, and the Bot -- Aeromatic

pointmass.name: Payload
pointmass.description: 4194 LBS + full (9565 LBS) fuel should bring model up to entered max weight

function.name: aero/function/ground-effect-factor-lift
function.description: Change in lift due to ground effect factor

function.name: aero/function/ground-effect-factor-drag
function.description: Change in drag due to ground effect

function.name: aero/coefficient/CLwbh
function.description: Lift due to alpha Increase in CL decreases Period and damping,Dutch Roll damping CL is low for landing

function.name: aero/coefficient/CLq
function.description: Basic Lift Coefficient due to pitch rate(per degree)

function.name: aero/coefficient/CLad
function.description: Basic Lift Coefficient due to AOA rate(per degree) Important contributor to Short-Period damping For low Cla, aircraft must land at high alpha

function.name: aero/coefficient/CLdF3L
function.description: Lift Coefficient due to Left Fowler Flaps Deflection Positive surface deflection is trailing edge down Ultimately, we will feed this left flap pos

function.name: aero/coefficient/CLdF3R
function.description: Lift Coefficient due to Right Fowler Flaps Deflection Positive surface deflection is trailing edge down Ultimately, we will feed this right flap pos

function.name: aero/coefficient/CLDe
function.description: Lift Coefficient due to Elevator Deflection Positive surface deflection is trailing edge down

function.name: aero/force/Lift_speedbrake
function.description: Delta Lift due to speedbrake

function.name: aero/coefficient/CD
function.description: Basic Drag Coefficient Sense: Always positive Main contributor to Phugoid damping: Greater Cd, Better damping

function.name: aero/coefficient/CdDf3L
function.description: Drag Coefficient due to Left Fowler Flaps Deflection Positive surface deflection is trailing edge down Ultimately, we will feed this left flap pos

function.name: aero/coefficient/CdDf3R
function.description: Drag Coefficient due to Right Fowler Flaps Deflection Positive surface deflection is trailing edge down Ultimately, we will feed this right flap pos

function.name: aero/coefficient/CdDe
function.description: Drag Coefficient due to Elevator Deflection Positive surface deflection is trailing edge down

function.name: aero/force/Drag_mach
function.description: Drag due to mach

function.name: aero/force/Drag_gear
function.description: Drag due to gear

function.name: aero/force/Drag_speedbrake
function.description: Drag due to speedbrakes

function.name: aero/force/Drag_beta
function.description: Drag due to sideslip

function.name: aero/coefficient/Cyb
function.description: Side Force coefficient due to Sideslip(per degree) Contributes to damping of Dutch Roll mode

function.name: aero/coefficient/Cyp
function.description: Side Force Coefficient due to Roll Rate(per degree)

function.name: aero/coefficient/Cyr
function.description: Side Force due to Yaw Rate(the effect is small, just guess a tiny number)

function.name: aero/coefficient/CyDr
function.description: Side Force due to rudder(guess a number)

function.name: aero/coefficient/CyDa
function.description: Side Force due to aileron(Neglected it)

function.name: aero/coefficient/Clb
function.description: Roll Moment coefficient due to Beta(per degree) Decrease of Clb to small negative value improves Dutch Roll Damping High Positive value leads to excessive spiral instability

function.name: aero/coefficient/Clp
function.description: Roll Moment coefficient due to roll rate(per degree) Clp alone determines damping-in-roll characteristics

function.name: aero/coefficient/Clr
function.description: Roll Moment coefficient due to yaw rate(per degree) Considerable effect on Spiral mode. Large positive values leads to strong sprial instability.

function.name: aero/coefficient/ClDl1
function.description: Roll Moment coefficient due to Left Aileron

function.name: aero/coefficient/ClDr1
function.description: Roll Moment coefficient due to Right Aileron

function.name: aero/coefficient/CldF3
function.description: Roll Moment Coefficient due to Asymetrical Fowler Flaps Deflection calculated as difference between left and right flap lift coef, times distance from centerline to MAC of surface.

function.name: aero/moment/Roll_rudder
function.description: Roll moment due to rudder

function.name: aero/coefficient/Cm_basic
function.description: Basic_Pitch_moment_coefficient

function.name: aero/coefficient/CmDe
function.description: Pitch moment coefficient due to elevator deflection Positive surface deflection is trailing edge down

function.name: aero/coefficient/Cmq
function.description: Pitch moment coefficient due to pitch rate(per degree) Pitch Damping Derivative Very important to Short Period damping of oscillations

function.name: aero/coefficient/Cmadot
function.description: Pitch moment coefficient due to AOA rate(per degree) Negitive Cmad increase Short Period damping

function.name: aero/coefficient/CmDf3L
function.description: Pitch moment coefficient due to left Fowler Flaps Deflection Positive surface deflection is trailing edge down Ultimately, we will feed this left flap pos

function.name: aero/coefficient/CmDf3R
function.description: Pitch moment coefficient due to right Fowler Flaps Deflection Positive surface deflection is trailing edge down Ultimately, we will feed this right flap pos

function.name: aero/coefficient/Cnb
function.description: Yaw moment coefficient due to sideslip(per degree) Determines Dutch Roll and Spiral characteristics Prevents side-slip and yawing moments

function.name: aero/coefficient/Cnp
function.description: Yaw moment coefficient due to roll rate(per degree) Reduces Dutch Roll damping positive value desireable

function.name: aero/moment/Yaw_beta
function.description: Yaw moment due to beta

function.name: aero/coefficient/Cnr
function.description: Yaw Moment coefficient due to yaw rate(per degree) Main contributor to damping of Dutch Roll

function.name: aero/coefficient/CnDf3
function.description: Yaw Moment Coefficient due to Asymetrical Fowler Flaps Deflection calculated as difference between left and right flap drag coef, times distance from centerline to MAC of surface.

function.name: aero/coefficient/CnDa
function.description: Yaw Moment coefficient due to plain flap aileron deflection

function.name: aero/coefficient/CnDr
function.description: Yaw Coefficient due to rudder(DATCOM does not calculate default reference value) High value for controllablity, low value for good dynamic stability

function.name: aero/elev_hinge_moment_ft_lbs
function.description: Elevator hinge moment in ft-lbs HM = q * S * Cbar * ( Ch0 + Cha*alpha + Chd*delta ) Positive causes trailing edge down movement Ch0 is used to artifically trim HM to zero
